name: CypherGrid
description:
CypherGrid is a picture logic puzzle, in which tiles in a grid must be colored according to numbers, to reveal a hidden pixel art-like picture.

The game may look familiar, but the puzzle mechanics are unique and original. It also contains elements of visual novel and point and click games. This is currently a short demo but it demonstrates great potential. I do plan on adding more levels and story, depending on the feedback.

If you liked this game, please leave a comment or follow for updates.
